About Me

Let me tell you a few things...

BIO

I am a MSc Computing student at Cardiff University. I am currently doing on an internship with SumoShift, where I am working on developing a website using react.js. Skills that I have developed so far from my internship are react.js, git version control, agile methodology, team working skills. In the near future I am excited to learn about testing.

I have learnt HTML, CSS, Python, JavaScript, Java, JavaFx, MySQL from my course at university. I also have experience working with Bootstrap and nodejs.

I have build various projects such as 1) E-commerce Website(HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Bootstrap) 2) University Static website demo(HTML, CSS) 3) Library Management website (HTML,CSS, JavaScript, JQuery, NoSQL) 4) Guess Number program (Python) My main interest is into front-end web development. However I am open to any kind of software development projects

SumoShift

Web Developer (Internship)

This is a 12 months internship as a part of my univresity course. I am currently working on developing a website using react.js . In the near future I will be starting with testing. Skills Developed: React.js, Agile methodology, Communication skills, Team working skills.

F&W Insights

Back -End web Developer (Internship)

I worked as a software development intern with F&W Insights, an IoT startup in Cardiff. I learnt skills such as nodejs, Google Firebase real-time database and Firebase firestore, writing reports etc.

Performance Bonus Ltd

Web Developer

Here I worked on a small project of rebuilding the website using HTML, CSS, Bootstrap and making few amends to the website elements as per the given description by the company.

ARC Hospitality Ltd

Till Cashier (Part-time)

This was my part-time job. I performed various roles in this job such as Till Cashier, Food Handler and Beverage Assistant. I learnt a lot of skills from these job roles such as Effective communication, Customer Service, Time Management etc
